name: Big Five Personality Test
description: This test measures your personality across five fundamental traits: Openness, Conscientiousness, Extraversion, Agreeableness, and Neuroticism.

questions.text: I enjoy trying new and unusual foods

translations.french: J'aime essayer de nouveaux aliments inhabituels
translations.spanish: Disfruto probando comidas nuevas e inusuales

questions.text: I often forget to put things back in their proper place

translations.french: J'oublie souvent de remettre les choses à leur place
translations.spanish: A menudo olvido poner las cosas en su lugar

translations.french: Je me sens à l'aise avec les gens
translations.spanish: Me siento cómodo alrededor de la gente

translations.french: Je compatis avec les sentiments des autres
translations.spanish: Simpatizo con los sentimientos de los demás
